Posts.Content: Jul 3, 2017 07:36PM AbbyG wrote: Hi Anxious! I'm so sorry you've gotten this news. There is no "one right" decision, it is entirely personal, but just know that this site has been a wealth of info and support. I had BMX and immediate recon, and I don't regret my decision; my mom had a lumpectomy and radiation and doesn't regret hers. It's all up to you, but we're here for you! (((Hugs))
